UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Cecropins from Plutella xylostella and Their Interaction with Metarhizium anisopliae.
Literature.Author: Ouyang L, Xu X, Freed S, Gao Y, Yu J, Wang S, Ju W, Zhang Y, Jin F

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=5.0µM),Bacillus cereus(MIC=3.5µM),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=0.5µM),Pseudomonas fluorescens(MIC=1.9µM),Salmonella enterica(MIC=2.5µM),Metarhizium anisopliae CCTCCM 208173(MIC=5.1µM),Botrytis cinerea(MIC=10.8µM),Penicillium crustosum(MIC=11.9µM),Phytophthora litchii(MIC=15.0µM),Colletotrichum gloeosporioides Penz.(MIC=18.2µM),Colletotrichum orbiculare(MIC=25.0µM),Fusarium oxysporum(MIC=12.0µM)
